title: Design and Application of Digital Game-Based Learning for Early Childhood Education

context.additional_context: Emphasis on Digital Game Design Competencies Applicable to Early Childhood Education Settings for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers: Simulation/VR Utilization in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environments

learning_goals: Explain the digital game-based learning design process for young children based on the Dick & Carey model
